manual.description: NOSSAS's mobilization manual summarizes much of what we have learned from a decade of experience with activism in Brazil. Check out how we mobilize people around causes or organize them in solidarity networks.

explain.title: What can you learn from the manual?
explain.1: Tips for strategies to help people achieve the change they want to make in the world.
explain.2: Information to understand who to put pressure on and how, and discover the public to mobilize for a cause.
explain.3: Techniques for creating interesting narratives to mobilize the public on social media and in other shared spaces.

mobilization.title: Mobilization manual
mobilization.description: Throughout the 10 chapters you will find references, successful cases, practical exercises and all the information we use to construct impact campaigns.
